review: As many others have stated, at times the fire stick will lose it's signal or constantly buffer which seriously takes the enjoyment out of watching live tv on Sling TV.  I have a smart tv and stream netflix on it with no problem.  I assumed the fire stick would work just as well.  Certain times there is no problem, other times you can't watch anything without it buffering or "catching up" continually.  Very frustrating.
author: K. Flint

review: I was excited to give this one a try.  But it just can't hold a candle to the Roku boxes I have.  It continually disconnects from my wifi connection, although it shows it as being a very good connection.  It's very frustrating and I haven't been able to get a fix for it, even with two chats with the always awesome customer service.  I think I would try the fire box versus the stick and hope that it does better at holding on the connection.
